resources.string: Coming together is a beginning; keeping together is progress; working together is success.\nHenry Ford
Success is not final, failure is not fatal: it is the courage to continue that counts.\nWinston Churchill
Progress is impossible without change, and those who cannot change their minds cannot change anything.\nGeorge Bernard Shaw
To improve is to change; to be perfect is to change often.\nWinston Churchill
Never believe that a few caring people can\'t change the world. For, indeed, that\'s all who ever have.\nMargaret Mead
If you change the way you look at things, the things you look at change.\nWayne Dyer
Very often a change of self is needed more than a change of scene.\nA. C. Benson
Once you replace negative thoughts with positive ones, you\'ll start having positive results.\nWillie Nelson
Keep your face to the sunshine and you cannot see a shadow.\nHelen Keller
Believe that life is worth living and your belief will help create the fact.\nWilliam James
